subject: [Mhln] download Suite 3 Design Premium
body:
Never celebrate until you are really out of the woods. They might be behind the last tree.
The customs and fashions of men change like leaves on the bough, some of which go and others come.
He is happy whom circumstances suit his temper but he Is more excellent who suits his temper to any circumstance.
The angry man will defeat himself in battle as well as in life.
Beware of all enterprises that require a new set of clothes.
It's not a slam at you when people are rude -- it's a slam at the people they've met before.
Chance favors only those who court her.
We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.
Not everything has a name. Some things lead us into a realm beyond words.
Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
It's not a slam at you when people are rude -- it's a slam at the people they've met before.
Fear not those who argue but those who dodge.
It requires more courage to suffer than to die.
Don't borrow money from a neighbor or a friend, but of a stranger where, paying for it you shall hear of it no more.
Unworthy offspring brag the most about their worthy descendants.
You don't always get what you ask for, but you never get what you don't ask for... unless it's contagious!
In a democracy dissent is an act of faith. Like medicine, the test of its value is not in its taste, but its effects.
Thou art all ice. Thy kindness freezes.
